lead_paragraph: The journalist, Oles Buzina, 45, publicly opposed the protests that led to the ouster of President Viktor F. Yanukovych in 2014.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Gunmen Kill Pro-Russian Journalist in Kiev
headline.main: Ukraine: Gunmen Kill Pro-Russian Journalist in Kiev

snippet: The journalist, Oles Buzina, 45, publicly opposed the protests that led to the ouster of President Viktor F. Yanukovych in 2014.
abstract: Unidentified gunmen kill Ukrainian journalist Oles Buzina, who publicly opposed protests that led to ouster of Ukrainian Pres VIktor F Yanukovych in 2014.
